descs.desc: Minecraft plugin implemented using the Spigot API
Transforms game into MMORPG style experience, as created by the server administrator
Server admins create quests, NPCs, items, rewards, shops, etc.
Framework works through config files, meaning each server has their own unique experience
Massive number of features, made completely configurable
Minecraft mod, implemented through the Forge API
Splits damage into slashing, crushing, and piercing types
Expands on armor and weapon progression
Provides extensive APIs and configuration options for developers and server admins
Introduces forging process, including: smelting, shaping, and quenching metals
Java Application using JSwing, specifically for QuestManager
Provides GUI interface for quest configuration creation and editing
Convenience software for QuestManager users who don't want to edit configs
